title: My Pixel s microphone is not working. Where do I get Google support in Slovakia?
content: After restart of phone it starts to work but just for a half day. Then again I cannot make a call. When recording video , there is message "microphone is used by another application". Video is recorded without audio. I did factory restart 3 times, same issue. In 3 fix services in Slovakia they said they are not able to fix it.
